tool_description: Take a screenshot of any URL. You can also configure various parameters such as width, height, time delay.
title: URL2Screenshot

api_list.name: TakeScreenshot
api_list.description:
Take Screenshot by specifying an url.

Optionally configure width, height, delay.

Parameters :-
width : Width of the screenshot
height : Height of the screenshot
delay : The delay(in milliseconds) after which the screenshot is taken

schema.error: body should contain a json specifying 'url'

api_list.name: TakeScreenshot
api_list.description:
Take Screenshot by specifying an url.

Optionally configure width, height, delay.

Parameters :-
width : Width of the screenshot
height : Height of the screenshot

api_list.name: GetDeviceList
api_list.description: Get the list of supported Devices which we can emulate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url2screenshot.p.rapidapi.com/getdevicelist"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url2screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
